did.abstract: Owner of SGI Publications, an Ann Arbor, Michigan firm; publisher of Current, a guide to movies and live entertainment in the Ann Arbor area. Press materials, photographs, and various promotional items received from musical bands, rock and roll groups, and individual performers scheduled to appear in Ann Arbor clubs.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection came from David DeVarti (donor no. 8400) in May 2011.

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, David DeVarti papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: David DeVarti was owner of SGI Publications which put out various guides and directories. The firm published Current, a guide to movies and to live entertainment, music and theatrical, in Ann Arbor and Washtenaw County, Michigan.

David DeVarti was the owner of Sport Guides, Inc., founded 1979, publisher of Michigan Football Guide, which grew out of his earlier Football Roster, published 1977-1978 for Ann Arbor's Coalition for Better Housing. The Football Roster and Football Guide were intended to be free competition for the University of Michigan's authorized football programs. Sport Guides' publications expanded in 1981 to include the Michigan Cinema Guide, and in 1987 with The Annual Ann Arbor Guide. In 1988 the Cinema Guide was replaced by Current, a broader guide to Ann Arbor events. DeVarti sold Current about 2007.

scopecontent.p: The David DeVarti collection consists of press materials, photographs, scattered letters, reviews of performances, and promotional items received from various musical artists, bands, rock and roll groups who performed in Ann Arbor and other area venues. The materials, arranged alphabetically, formed the basis for the articles and schedule of events which appeared in the Current magazine.

did.unittitle: Lil' Red & The Big Blues Band
Stielstra, Jay, Old Man in Love

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The library has a collection of Current (1988-2008).
